General.Name: Medifron DBT Co. Ltd
General.Description: Medifron DBT Co., Ltd., a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company, focuses on the development of Alzheimer's disease (AD) and neuropathic pain treatments, and AD diagnostics. The company was formerly known as Legend Technologies Inc. and changed its name to Medifron DBT Co., Ltd. in 2006. Medifron DBT Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
